title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 02, 2019
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 02, 2019 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Swift
items.content_text:
### Network / Barcode

*   [Connectivity (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/rwbutler/Connectivity) - üåê Makes Internet connectivity detection more robust by detecting Wi-Fi networks without Internet access.
items.content_html:
Network / Barcode

  • Connectivity (‚≠ê1.7k) - üåê Makes Internet connectivity detection more robust by detecting Wi-Fi networks without Internet access.

items.title: Awesome Python
items.content_text:
### Audio

*   Metadata
    *   [beets (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/beetbox/beets) - A music library manager and [MusicBrainz](https://musicbrainz.org/) tagger.
    *   [eyed3 (‚≠ê590)](https://github.com/nicfit/eyeD3) - A tool for working with audio files, specifically MP3 files containing ID3 metadata.
    *   [mutagen (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/quodlibet/mutagen) - A Python module to handle audio metadata.
    *   [tinytag (‚≠ê767)](https://github.com/devsnd/tinytag) - A library for reading music meta data of MP3, OGG, FLAC and Wave files.

### Authentication

*   JWT
    *   [pyjwt (‚≠ê5.4k)](https://github.com/jpadilla/pyjwt) - JSON Web Token implementation in Python.
    *   [python-jose (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/mpdavis/python-jose/) - A JOSE implementation in Python.

### Web Asset Management

*   [django-compressor (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/django-compressor/django-compressor) - Compresses linked and inline JavaScript or CSS into a single cached file.
*   [django-pipeline (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-pipeline) - An asset packaging library for Django.
*   [django-storages (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/jschneier/django-storages) - A collection of custom storage back ends for Django.
*   [fanstatic](http://www.fanstatic.org/en/latest/) - Packages, optimizes, and serves static file dependencies as Python packages.
*   [fileconveyor](http://wimleers.com/fileconveyor) - A daemon to detect and sync files to CDNs, S3 and FTP.
*   [flask-assets (‚≠ê458)](https://github.com/miracle2k/flask-assets) - Helps you integrate webassets into your Flask app.
*   [webassets (‚≠ê928)](https://github.com/miracle2k/webassets) - Bundles, optimizes, and manages unique cache-busting URLs for static resources.
items.content_html:
Audio

  • Metadata
    • beets (‚≠ê14k) - A music library manager and MusicBrainz tagger.
    • eyed3 (‚≠ê590) - A tool for working with audio files, specifically MP3 files containing ID3 metadata.
    • mutagen (‚≠ê1.7k) - A Python module to handle audio metadata.
    • tinytag (‚≠ê767) - A library for reading music meta data of MP3, OGG, FLAC and Wave files.

Authentication

  • JWT
    • pyjwt (‚≠ê5.4k) - JSON Web Token implementation in Python.
    • python-jose (‚≠ê1.6k) - A JOSE implementation in Python.

Web Asset Management

  • django-compressor (‚≠ê2.8k) - Compresses linked and inline JavaScript or CSS into a single cached file.
  • django-pipeline (‚≠ê1.5k) - An asset packaging library for Django.
  • django-storages (‚≠ê2.9k) - A collection of custom storage back ends for Django.
  • fanstatic - Packages, optimizes, and serves static file dependencies as Python packages.
  • fileconveyor - A daemon to detect and sync files to CDNs, S3 and FTP.
  • flask-assets (‚≠ê458) - Helps you integrate webassets into your Flask app.
  • webassets (‚≠ê928) - Bundles, optimizes, and manages unique cache-busting URLs for static resources.

items.title: Awesome Ros2
items.content_text:
### Packages / Demonstrations

*   [adlink\_ddsbot (‚≠ê41)](https://github.com/Adlink-ROS/adlink_ddsbot) - The ROS 2.0/1.0 based robots swarm architecture (opensplice DDS). ![adlink\_ddsbot](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Adlink-ROS/adlink_ddsbot.svg)
*   [adlink\_neuronbot (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/Adlink-ROS/adlink_neuronbot) - ROS2/DDS robot pkg for human following and swarm. ![adlink\_neuronbot](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Adlink-ROS/adlink_neuronbot.svg)
*   [turtlebot3 (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/ROBOTIS-GIT/turtlebot3/tree/ros2) - ROS2 based TurtleBot3 demo including Bringup, Teleop and Cartographer. ![turtlebot3](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ROBOTIS-GIT/turtlebot3.svg)

### Packages / Examples

*   [turtlebot2\_demo (‚≠ê99)](https://github.com/ros2/turtlebot2_demo) - TurtleBot 2 demos using ROS 2. ![turtlebot2\_demo](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/turtlebot2_demo.svg)
*   [examples/rclcpp (‚≠ê804)](https://github.com/ros2/examples/tree/master/rclcpp) - C++ examples. ![ros2/examples](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/examples.svg)
*   [examples/rclpy (‚≠ê804)](https://github.com/ros2/examples/tree/master/rclpy) - Python examples. ![ros2/examples](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/examples.svg)
*   [rcljava\_examples (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_java_examples/tree/master/rcljava_examples) - Package containing examples of how to use the rcljava API. ![ros2\_java\_examples](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_java_examples.svg)

### Packages / Benchmarking

*   [ros2\_benchmarking (‚≠ê48)](https://github.com/piappl/ros2_benchmarking) - Framework for ROS2 benchmarking. ROS2 communication characteristics can be evaluated on several axes, quickly and in an automated way. ![ros2\_benchmarking](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/piappl/ros2_benchmarking.svg)
*   [performance\_test (‚≠ê65)](https://github.com/ApexAI/performance_test) - Test performance and latency of various communication means like ROS 2, FastRTPS and Connext DDS Micro. ![performance\_test](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ApexAI/performance_test.svg)

### Packages / Containerization

*   [docker-ros2-ospl-ce (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/Adlink-ROS/docker-ros2-ospl-ce) - A dockerfile to build a ROS2 + OpenSplice CE container. ![docker-ros2-ospl-ce](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Adlink-ROS/docker-ros2-ospl-ce.svg)
*   [ros2\_java\_docker (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_java_docker) - Dockerfiles for building ros2\_java with OpenJDK and Android. ![ros2\_java\_docker](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_java_docker.svg)

### Packages / Ecosystem

*   [rosbag2 (‚≠ê340)](https://github.com/ros2/rosbag2) - ROS2 native rosbag. ![rosbag2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rosbag2.svg)
*   [rviz (‚≠ê374)](https://github.com/ros2/rviz) - 3D Robot Visualizer. ![rviz](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rviz.svg)
*   [ros2cli (‚≠ê213)](https://github.com/ros2/ros2cli) - ROS 2 command line tools. ![ros2cli](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/ros2cli.svg)
*   [orocos\_kinematics\_dynamics (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/ros2/orocos_kinematics_dynamics) - Orocos Kinematics and Dynamics C++ library. ![orocos\_kinematics\_dynamics](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/orocos_kinematics_dynamics.svg)
*   [pydds (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/atolab/pydds) - Simple DDS Python API for Vortex Lite and for OpenSplice. ![pydds](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/atolab/pydds.svg)

### Packages / Application layer

*   [ros2\_control (‚≠ê656)](https://github.com/ros-controls/ros2_control) - `ros2_control` is a proof of concept on how new features within ROS 2 can be elaborated and used in the context of robot control (`ros2_controllers`). ![ros2\_control](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros-controls/ros2_control.svg)
*   [ros2\_controllers (‚≠ê507)](https://github.com/ros-controls/ros2_controllers) - Description of ros\_controllers. ![ros2\_controllers](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros-controls/ros2_controllers.svg)
*   [geometry2 (‚≠ê140)](https://github.com/ros2/geometry2) - A set of ROS packages for keeping track of coordinate transforms. ![geometry2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/geometry2.svg)
*   [cartographer (‚≠ê105)](https://github.com/ros2/cartographer) - Real-time simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) in 2D and 3D across multiple platforms and sensor configurations. ![cartographer](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/cartographer.svg)
*   [teleop\_twist\_keyboard (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/ros2/teleop_twist_keyboard) - Generic Keyboard Teleop for ROS2. ![teleop\_twist\_keyboard](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/teleop_twist_keyboard.svg)
*   [teleop\_twist\_joy (‚≠ê68)](https://github.com/ros2/teleop_twist_joy) - Simple joystick teleop for twist robots. ![teleop\_twist\_joy](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/teleop_twist_joy.svg)
*   [diagnostics (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/bponsler/diagnostics/tree/ros2-devel) - Forked version of the original ROS1 Diagnostics for ROS 2 (currently diagnostics\_updater only). ![diagnostics](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/bponsler/diagnostics.svg)
*   [robot\_state\_publisher (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/bponsler/robot_state_publisher/tree/publish-robot-model) - Forked version of the original ROS Robot State Publisher with all modifications to compile within a ROS2 Ecosystem. ![robot\_state\_publisher](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/bponsler/robot_state_publisher.svg)
*   [common\_interfaces (‚≠ê293)](https://github.com/ros2/common_interfaces) - A set of packages which contain common interface files (.msg and .srv). ![common\_interfaces](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/common_interfaces.svg)
*   [ros2\_object\_map (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/intel/ros2_object_map) - "Mark tag of objects on map when SLAM". ![ros2\_object\_map](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/intel/ros2_object_map.svg)
*   [ros2\_object\_analytics (‚≠ê103)](https://github.com/intel/ros2_object_analytics) - Object Analytics (OA) is ROS2 wrapper for realtime object detection, localization and tracking. ![ros2\_object\_analytics](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/intel/ros2_object_analytics.svg)
*   [ros2\_intel\_movidius\_ncs (‚≠ê26)](https://github.com/intel/ros2_intel_movidius_ncs) - ROS2 wrapper for Movidius‚Ñ¢ Neural Compute Stick (NCS) Neuronal Compute API. ![ros2\_intel\_movidius\_ncs](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/intel/ros2_intel_movidius_ncs.svg)
*   [ros2\_moving\_object (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/intel/ros2_moving_object) - Addressing moving objects based on messages generated by Object Analytics `ros2_object_analytics`. ![ros2\_moving\_object](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/intel/ros2_moving_object.svg)
*   [ros2\_openvino\_toolkit (‚≠ê176)](https://github.com/intel/ros2_openvino_toolkit) - ROS2 wrapper for CV API of OpenVINO‚Ñ¢ (human vision emulation). ![ros2\_openvino\_toolkit](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/intel/ros2_openvino_toolkit.svg)
*   [ros2\_grasp\_library (‚≠ê211)](https://github.com/intel/ros2_grasp_library) - Probably a grasp library :). ![ros2\_grasp\_library](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/intel/ros2_grasp_library.svg)
*   [ros2\_message\_filters (‚≠ê21)](https://github.com/intel/ros2_message_filters) - ros2\_message\_filters blends various messages based on the conditions that filter needs to met and derives from ROS2 porting of ROS message\_filters. ![ros2\_message\_filters](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/intel/ros2_message_filters.svg)
*   [ros2-tensorflow (‚≠ê60)](https://github.com/alsora/ros2-tensorflow) - ROS2 nodes for computer vision tasks in Tensorflow. ![ros2-tensorflow](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/alsora/ros2-tensorflow.svg)
*   [pid (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/UTNuclearRoboticsPublic/pid) - A PID controller for ROS2. ![pid](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/UTNuclearRoboticsPublic/pid.svg)

### Packages / "System" bindings

*   [rclandroid (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_android/tree/master/rclandroid) - Android API for ROS2. ![rclandroid](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_android.svg)
*   [riot-ros2 (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/astralien3000/riot-ros2) - This project enables ROS2 to run on microcontrollers using the RIOT Operating System. ![riot-ros2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/astralien3000/riot-ros2.svg)

### Packages / Client libraries

*   [rclnodejs (‚≠ê368)](https://github.com/RobotWebTools/rclnodejs) - ROS Client Library for Node.js. ![rclnodejs](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/RobotWebTools/rclnodejs.svg)
*   [rclada (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/ada-ros/rclada) - ROS Client Library for Ada. ![rclada](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ada-ros/rclada.svg)
*   [rclcpp (‚≠ê627)](https://github.com/ros2/rclcpp) - ROS Client Library for C++. ![rclcpp](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rclcpp.svg)
*   [rclgo (‚≠ê55)](https://github.com/juaruipav/rclgo) - ROS Client Library for Go. ![rclgo](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/juaruipav/rclgo.svg)
*   [rclpy (‚≠ê359)](https://github.com/ros2/rclpy) - ROS Client Library for Python. ![rclpy](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rclpy.svg)
*   [rcljava (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_java/tree/master/rcljava) - ROS Client Library for Java. ![rcljava](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_java.svg)
*   [rclobjc (‚≠ê31)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_objc) - ROS Client Library for Objective C (for iOS). ![rclobjc](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_objc.svg)
*   [rclc (‚≠ê134)](https://github.com/ros2/rclc) - ROS Client Library for C. ![rclc](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rclc.svg)
*   [ros2\_dotnet (‚≠ê161)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_dotnet) - .NET bindings for ROS2. ![ros2\_dotnet](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_dotnet.svg)

### Packages / Driver layer

*   [cozmo\_driver\_ros2 (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/FurqanHabibi/cozmo_driver_ros2) - Unofficial Anki Cozmo node for ROS2. ![cozmo\_driver\_ros2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/FurqanHabibi/cozmo_driver_ros2.svg)
*   [sphero\_ros2 (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/athackst/sphero_ros2) - ROS2 sphero driver. ![sphero\_ros2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/athackst/sphero_ros2.svg)
*   [flock2 (‚≠ê67)](https://github.com/clydemcqueen/flock2) - ROS2 driver for DJI Tello drones. ![flock2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/clydemcqueen/flock2.svg)
*   [ros2\_raspicam\_node (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/Misterblue/ros2_raspicam_node) - ROS2 node for Raspberry Pi camera. ![ros2\_raspicam\_node](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Misterblue/ros2_raspicam_node.svg)
*   [joystick\_drivers (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/ros2/joystick_drivers) - ROS2 drivers for joysticks. ![joystick\_drivers](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/joystick_drivers.svg)
*   [joystick\_drivers\_from\_scratch (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/ros2/joystick_drivers_from_scratch) - Joystick driver packages for ROS 2. ![joystick\_drivers\_from\_scratch](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/joystick_drivers_from_scratch.svg)
*   [joystick\_ros2 (‚≠ê60)](https://github.com/FurqanHabibi/joystick_ros2) - Joystick driver for ROS2, support all platforms: Linux, macOS, Windows. ![joystick\_ros2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/FurqanHabibi/joystick_ros2.svg)
*   [ros2\_teleop\_keyboard (‚≠ê23)](https://github.com/rohbotics/ros2_teleop_keyboard) - Teleop Twist Keyboard for ROS2. ![ros2\_teleop\_keyboard](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/rohbotics/ros2_teleop_keyboard.svg)
*   [ros\_astra\_camera (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/ros2/ros_astra_camera) - ROS2 wrapper for Astra camera. ![ros\_astra\_camera](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/ros_astra_camera.svg)
*   [ros2\_usb\_camera (‚≠ê95)](https://github.com/klintan/ros2_usb_camera) - ROS2 General USB camera driver. ![ros\_astra\_camera](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/klintan/ros2_usb_camera.svg)
*   [ros2\_android\_drivers (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_android_drivers) - Collection of ROS2 drivers for several Android sensors. ![ros2\_android\_drivers](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_android_drivers.svg)
*   [ros2\_intel\_realsense (‚≠ê145)](https://github.com/intel/ros2_intel_realsense) - ROS2 Wrapper for Intel¬Æ RealSense‚Ñ¢ Devices. ![ros2\_intel\_realsense](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/intel/ros2_intel_realsense.svg)
*   [raspicam2\_node (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/christianrauch/raspicam2_node) - ROS2 node for camera module of Raspberry Pi. ![raspicam2\_node](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/christianrauch/raspicam2_node.svg)
*   [FIROS2 (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/eProsima/FIROS2) - ROS2 integrable tool focused in the intercommunication between ROS2 and FIWARE. ![FIROS2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/eProsima/FIROS2.svg)
*   [lino2\_upper](https://github.com/linorobot2/lino2_upper) - Linorobot on ROS2. ![lino2\_upper](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/linorobot2/lino2_upper.svg)
*   [RysROS2 (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/GroupOfRobots/RysROS2) - ROS2 software stack for MiniRys robots. ![RysROS2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/GroupOfRobots/RysROS2.svg)
*   [px4\_to\_ros (‚≠ê27)](https://github.com/eProsima/px4_to_ros) - ROS2/ROS packages for communicate PX4 with ROS. ![px4\_to\_ros](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/eProsima/px4_to_ros.svg)
*   [multiwii\_ros2 (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/christianrauch/multiwii_ros2) - ROS2 Node for MultiWii and Cleanflight flight controllers. ![multiwii\_ros2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/christianrauch/multiwii_ros2.svg)
*   [ydlidar\_ros2 (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/Adlink-ROS/ydlidar_ros2) - ROS2 wrapper for ydlidar. ![ydlidar\_ros2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Adlink-ROS/ydlidar_ros2.svg)

### Packages / Client libraries common

*   [rcl (‚≠ê140)](https://github.com/ros2/rcl) - Library to support implementation of language specific ROS Client Libraries. ![rcl](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rcl.svg)
*   [system\_tests (‚≠ê42)](https://github.com/ros2/system_tests) - Tests for rclcpp and rclpy. ![system\_tests](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/system_tests.svg)
*   [rcl\_interfaces (‚≠ê51)](https://github.com/ros2/rcl_interfaces) - A repository for messages and services used by the ROS client libraries. ![rcl\_interfaces](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rcl_interfaces.svg)

### Packages / IDL generators

*   [rosidl\_generator\_java (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_java/tree/master/rosidl_generator_java) - Generate the ROS interfaces in Java. ![ros2\_java](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_java.svg)
*   [rosidl\_generator\_objc (‚≠ê31)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_objc/tree/master/rosidl_generator_objc) - Generate the ROS interfaces in Objective C. ![ros2\_objc](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_objc.svg)
*   [rosidl\_generator\_cpp (‚≠ê93)](https://github.com/ros2/rosidl/tree/master/rosidl_generator_cpp) - Generate the ROS interfaces in C++. ![rosidl](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rosidl.svg)
*   [rosidl\_generator\_c (‚≠ê93)](https://github.com/ros2/rosidl/tree/master/rosidl_generator_c) - Generate the ROS interfaces in C. ![rosidl](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rosidl.svg)
*   [rosidl (‚≠ê93)](https://github.com/ros2/rosidl) - Packages which provide the ROS IDL (.msg) definition and code generation. ![rosidl](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rosidl.svg)
*   [rosidl\_dds (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/ros2/rosidl_dds) - Generate the DDS interfaces for ROS interfaces. ![rosidl\_dds](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rosidl_dds.svg)

### Packages / RMW (ROS middleware)

*   [rmw (‚≠ê105)](https://github.com/ros2/rmw/tree/master/rmw) - Contains the ROS middleware API. ![rmw](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rmw.svg)
*   [rmw\_connext\_cpp (‚≠ê27)](https://github.com/ros2/rmw_connext/tree/master/rmw_connext_cpp) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using RTI Connext static code generation in C++. ![rmw\_connext\_cpp](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rmw_connext.svg)
*   [rmw\_fastrtps\_cpp (‚≠ê177)](https://github.com/ros2/rmw_fastrtps/tree/master/rmw_fastrtps_cpp) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using eProsima FastRTPS static code generation in C++. ![rmw\_fastrtps\_cpp](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rmw_fastrtps.svg)
*   [rmw\_dps (‚≠ê26)](https://github.com/ros2/rmw_dps) - Implementation of the ROS Middleware (rmw) Interface using Intel's Distributed Publish & Subscribe. ![rmw\_dps](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rmw_dps.svg)
*   [rmw\_opensplice\_cpp (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/ros2/rmw_opensplice/tree/master/rmw_opensplice_cpp) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using PrismTech OpenSplice static code generation in C++. ![rmw\_opensplice\_cpp](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rmw_opensplice.svg)
*   [rmw\_coredx (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/tocinc/rmw_coredx) - CoreDX DDS integration layer for ROS2. ![tocinc/rmw\_coredx](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/tocinc/rmw_coredx.svg)
*   [rmw\_freertps (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/ros2/rmw_freertps) - RMW implementation using freertps. ![tocinc/rmw\_coredx](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rmw_freertps.svg)
*   [rcutils (‚≠ê64)](https://github.com/ros2/rcutils) - Common C functions and data structures used in ROS 2. ![rmw](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rcutils.svg)
*   [rmw\_cyclonedds (‚≠ê136)](https://github.com/atolab/rmw_cyclonedds) - ROS2 RMW layer for Eclipse Cyclone DDS. ![rmw\_cyclonedds](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/atolab/rmw_cyclonedds.svg)

### Packages / DDS communication mechanism implementations

*   [freertps (‚≠ê92)](https://github.com/ros2/freertps) - A free, portable, minimalist, work-in-progress RTPS implementation. ![freertps](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/freertps.svg)
*   [Fast-RTPS (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-RTPS) - Implementation of RTPS Standard (RTPS is the wire interoperability protocol for DDS). ![Fast-RTPS](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/eProsima/Fast-RTPS.svg)
*   [OpenSplice (‚≠ê269)](https://github.com/ADLINK-IST/opensplice) - Implementation of the OMG DDS Standard. ![opensplice](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ADLINK-IST/opensplice.svg) :heavy\_dollar\_sign:
*   [CoreDX DDS](http://www.twinoakscomputing.com/coredx) - Implementation of Twin Oaks Computing, Inc.. :heavy\_dollar\_sign:
*   [cdds (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/atolab/cdds) - Cyclone DDS is developed completely in the open and is undergoing the acceptance process to become part of Eclipse IoT. ![cdds](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/atolab/cdds.svg)
*   [Micro-XRCE-DDS) (‚≠ê170)](https://github.com/eProsima/Micro-XRCE-DDS) - An XRCE DDS implementation (supported by microROS). ![Micro-XRCE-DDS](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/eProsima/Micro-XRCE-DDS.svg)

### Packages / Build system (Linux)

*   [meta-ros2 (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/erlerobot/meta-ros2) - ROS 2 Layer for OpenEmbedded Linux. ![meta-ros2](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/erlerobot/meta-ros2.svg)

### Packages / Build system (ROS2)

*   [ci (‚≠ê50)](https://github.com/ros2/ci) - ROS 2 CI Infrastructure. ![ci](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/ci.svg)
*   [ament\_cmake\_export\_jars (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/esteve/ros2_java/tree/master/ament_cmake_export_jars) - The ability to export Java archives to downstream packages in the ament buildsystem in CMake. ![ros2\_java](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/esteve/ros2_java.svg)
*   [rmw\_implementation\_cmake (‚≠ê105)](https://github.com/ros2/rmw/tree/master/rmw_implementation_cmake) - CMake functions which can discover and enumerate available implementations. ![rmw](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rmw.svg)
*   [rmw\_implementation (‚≠ê24)](https://github.com/ros2/rmw_implementation) - CMake infrastructure and dependencies for rmw implementations. ![rmw](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ros2/rmw_implementation.svg)

### Papers / ROSCon 2015

*   [Introducting the Robot Security Framework (RSF), A standardized methodology to perform security assessments in robotics](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1806.04042.pdf)
*   [Towards an open standard for assessing the severity of robot security vulnerabilities, The Robot Vulnerability Scoring System (RVSS)](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1807.10357.pdf)
items.content_html:
Packages / Demonstrations

  • adlink_ddsbot (‚≠ê41) - The ROS 2.0/1.0 based robots swarm architecture (opensplice DDS).
  • adlink_neuronbot (‚≠ê15) - ROS2/DDS robot pkg for human following and swarm.
  • turtlebot3 (‚≠ê1.7k) - ROS2 based TurtleBot3 demo including Bringup, Teleop and Cartographer.

Packages / Examples

  • turtlebot2_demo (‚≠ê99) - TurtleBot 2 demos using ROS 2.
  • examples/rclcpp (‚≠ê804) - C++ examples.
  • examples/rclpy (‚≠ê804) - Python examples.
  • rcljava_examples (‚≠ê15) - Package containing examples of how to use the rcljava API.

Packages / Benchmarking

  • ros2_benchmarking (‚≠ê48) - Framework for ROS2 benchmarking. ROS2 communication characteristics can be evaluated on several axes, quickly and in an automated way.
  • performance_test (‚≠ê65) - Test performance and latency of various communication means like ROS 2, FastRTPS and Connext DDS Micro.

Packages / Containerization

  • docker-ros2-ospl-ce (‚≠ê10) - A dockerfile to build a ROS2 + OpenSplice CE container.
  • ros2_java_docker (‚≠ê6) - Dockerfiles for building ros2_java with OpenJDK and Android.

Packages / Ecosystem

  • rosbag2 (‚≠ê340) - ROS2 native rosbag.
  • rviz (‚≠ê374) - 3D Robot Visualizer.
  • ros2cli (‚≠ê213) - ROS 2 command line tools.
  • orocos_kinematics_dynamics (‚≠ê9) - Orocos Kinematics and Dynamics C++ library.
  • pydds (‚≠ê25) - Simple DDS Python API for Vortex Lite and for OpenSplice.

Packages / Application layer

  • ros2_control (‚≠ê656) - ros2_control is a proof of concept on how new features within ROS 2 can be elaborated and used in the context of robot control (ros2_controllers).
  • ros2_controllers (‚≠ê507) - Description of ros_controllers.
  • geometry2 (‚≠ê140) - A set of ROS packages for keeping track of coordinate transforms.
  • cartographer (‚≠ê105) - Real-time simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) in 2D and 3D across multiple platforms and sensor configurations.
  • teleop_twist_keyboard (‚≠ê43) - Generic Keyboard Teleop for ROS2.
  • teleop_twist_joy (‚≠ê68) - Simple joystick teleop for twist robots.
  • diagnostics (‚≠ê1) - Forked version of the original ROS1 Diagnostics for ROS 2 (currently diagnostics_updater only).
  • robot_state_publisher (‚≠ê4) - Forked version of the original ROS Robot State Publisher with all modifications to compile within a ROS2 Ecosystem.
  • common_interfaces (‚≠ê293) - A set of packages which contain common interface files (.msg and .srv).
  • ros2_object_map (‚≠ê14) - "Mark tag of objects on map when SLAM".
  • ros2_object_analytics (‚≠ê103) - Object Analytics (OA) is ROS2 wrapper for realtime object detection, localization and tracking.
  • ros2_intel_movidius_ncs (‚≠ê26) - ROS2 wrapper for Movidius‚Ñ¢ Neural Compute Stick (NCS) Neuronal Compute API.
  • ros2_moving_object (‚≠ê5) - Addressing moving objects based on messages generated by Object Analytics ros2_object_analytics.
  • ros2_openvino_toolkit (‚≠ê176) - ROS2 wrapper for CV API of OpenVINO‚Ñ¢ (human vision emulation).
  • ros2_grasp_library (‚≠ê211) - Probably a grasp library :).
  • ros2_message_filters (‚≠ê21) - ros2_message_filters blends various messages based on the conditions that filter needs to met and derives from ROS2 porting of ROS message_filters.
  • ros2-tensorflow (‚≠ê60) - ROS2 nodes for computer vision tasks in Tensorflow.
  • pid (‚≠ê15) - A PID controller for ROS2.

Packages / "System" bindings

  • rclandroid (‚≠ê4) - Android API for ROS2.
  • riot-ros2 (‚≠ê25) - This project enables ROS2 to run on microcontrollers using the RIOT Operating System.

Packages / Client libraries

  • rclnodejs (‚≠ê368) - ROS Client Library for Node.js.
  • rclada (‚≠ê11) - ROS Client Library for Ada.
  • rclcpp (‚≠ê627) - ROS Client Library for C++.
  • rclgo (‚≠ê55) - ROS Client Library for Go.
  • rclpy (‚≠ê359) - ROS Client Library for Python.
  • rcljava (‚≠ê17) - ROS Client Library for Java.
  • rclobjc (‚≠ê31) - ROS Client Library for Objective C (for iOS).
  • rclc (‚≠ê134) - ROS Client Library for C.
  • ros2_dotnet (‚≠ê161) - .NET bindings for ROS2.

Packages / Driver layer

  • cozmo_driver_ros2 (‚≠ê5) - Unofficial Anki Cozmo node for ROS2.
  • sphero_ros2 (‚≠ê1) - ROS2 sphero driver.
  • flock2 (‚≠ê67) - ROS2 driver for DJI Tello drones.
  • ros2_raspicam_node (‚≠ê10) - ROS2 node for Raspberry Pi camera.
  • joystick_drivers (‚≠ê5) - ROS2 drivers for joysticks.
  • joystick_drivers_from_scratch (‚≠ê1) - Joystick driver packages for ROS 2.
  • joystick_ros2 (‚≠ê60) - Joystick driver for ROS2, support all platforms: Linux, macOS, Windows.
  • ros2_teleop_keyboard (‚≠ê23) - Teleop Twist Keyboard for ROS2.
  • ros_astra_camera (‚≠ê10) - ROS2 wrapper for Astra camera.
  • ros2_usb_camera (‚≠ê95) - ROS2 General USB camera driver.
  • ros2_android_drivers (‚≠ê2) - Collection of ROS2 drivers for several Android sensors.
  • ros2_intel_realsense (‚≠ê145) - ROS2 Wrapper for Intel¬Æ RealSense‚Ñ¢ Devices.
  • raspicam2_node (‚≠ê43) - ROS2 node for camera module of Raspberry Pi.
  • FIROS2 (‚≠ê8) - ROS2 integrable tool focused in the intercommunication between ROS2 and FIWARE.
  • lino2_upper - Linorobot on ROS2.
  • RysROS2 (‚≠ê4) - ROS2 software stack for MiniRys robots.
  • px4_to_ros (‚≠ê27) - ROS2/ROS packages for communicate PX4 with ROS.
  • multiwii_ros2 (‚≠ê12) - ROS2 Node for MultiWii and Cleanflight flight controllers.
  • ydlidar_ros2 (‚≠ê2) - ROS2 wrapper for ydlidar.

Packages / Client libraries common

  • rcl (‚≠ê140) - Library to support implementation of language specific ROS Client Libraries.
  • system_tests (‚≠ê42) - Tests for rclcpp and rclpy.
  • rcl_interfaces (‚≠ê51) - A repository for messages and services used by the ROS client libraries.

Packages / IDL generators

  • rosidl_generator_java (‚≠ê17) - Generate the ROS interfaces in Java.
  • rosidl_generator_objc (‚≠ê31) - Generate the ROS interfaces in Objective C.
  • rosidl_generator_cpp (‚≠ê93) - Generate the ROS interfaces in C++.
  • rosidl_generator_c (‚≠ê93) - Generate the ROS interfaces in C.
  • rosidl (‚≠ê93) - Packages which provide the ROS IDL (.msg) definition and code generation.
  • rosidl_dds (‚≠ê8) - Generate the DDS interfaces for ROS interfaces.

Packages / RMW (ROS middleware)

  • rmw (‚≠ê105) - Contains the ROS middleware API.
  • rmw_connext_cpp (‚≠ê27) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using RTI Connext static code generation in C++.
  • rmw_fastrtps_cpp (‚≠ê177) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using eProsima FastRTPS static code generation in C++.
  • rmw_dps (‚≠ê26) - Implementation of the ROS Middleware (rmw) Interface using Intel's Distributed Publish & Subscribe.
  • rmw_opensplice_cpp (‚≠ê12) - Implement the ROS middleware interface using PrismTech OpenSplice static code generation in C++.
  • rmw_coredx (‚≠ê0) - CoreDX DDS integration layer for ROS2.
  • rmw_freertps (‚≠ê1) - RMW implementation using freertps.
  • rcutils (‚≠ê64) - Common C functions and data structures used in ROS 2.
  • rmw_cyclonedds (‚≠ê136) - ROS2 RMW layer for Eclipse Cyclone DDS.

Packages / DDS communication mechanism implementations

  • freertps (‚≠ê92) - A free, portable, minimalist, work-in-progress RTPS implementation.
  • Fast-RTPS (‚≠ê2.5k) - Implementation of RTPS Standard (RTPS is the wire interoperability protocol for DDS).
  • OpenSplice (‚≠ê269) - Implementation of the OMG DDS Standard. üí≤
  • CoreDX DDS - Implementation of Twin Oaks Computing, Inc.. üí≤
  • cdds (‚≠ê8) - Cyclone DDS is developed completely in the open and is undergoing the acceptance process to become part of Eclipse IoT.
  • Micro-XRCE-DDS) (‚≠ê170) - An XRCE DDS implementation (supported by microROS).

Packages / Build system (Linux)

  • meta-ros2 (‚≠ê19) - ROS 2 Layer for OpenEmbedded Linux.

Packages / Build system (ROS2)

  • ci (‚≠ê50) - ROS 2 CI Infrastructure.
  • ament_cmake_export_jars (‚≠ê17) - The ability to export Java archives to downstream packages in the ament buildsystem in CMake.
  • rmw_implementation_cmake (‚≠ê105) - CMake functions which can discover and enumerate available implementations.
  • rmw_implementation (‚≠ê24) - CMake infrastructure and dependencies for rmw implementations.

Papers / ROSCon 2015

  • Introducting the Robot Security Framework (RSF), A standardized methodology to perform security assessments in robotics
  • Towards an open standard for assessing the severity of robot security vulnerabilities, The Robot Vulnerability Scoring System (RVSS)

items.title: Awesome Ddd
items.content_text:
### Libraries and Frameworks / .NET

*   [Dolittle](https://dolittle.com) - Build better applications with Dolittle. An Event Sourced, Microservice platform oriented around DDD with developer productivity and simplicity front and center.
items.content_html:
Libraries and Frameworks / .NET

  • Dolittle - Build better applications with Dolittle. An Event Sourced, Microservice platform oriented around DDD with developer productivity and simplicity front and center.

items.title: Awesome Cli Apps
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Terminal Sharing Utilities

*   [gotty (‚≠ê19k)](https://github.com/yudai/gotty) - Share your terminal as a web application.
*   [mosh](https://mosh.org/) - Remote SSH client that allows roaming with intermittent connectivity.
*   [warp (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/spolu/warp) - Secure and simple terminal sharing.

### Files and Directories / Files

*   [NCDu](https://dev.yorhel.nl/ncdu) - A disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface.

### Files and Directories / Directory Navigation

*   [autojump (‚≠ê17k)](https://github.com/wting/autojump) - A cd command that learns - easily navigate directories from the command line.
items.content_html:
Utilities / Terminal Sharing Utilities

  • gotty (‚≠ê19k) - Share your terminal as a web application.
  • mosh - Remote SSH client that allows roaming with intermittent connectivity.
  • warp (‚≠ê1.6k) - Secure and simple terminal sharing.

Files and Directories / Files

  • NCDu - A disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface.

Files and Directories / Directory Navigation

  • autojump (‚≠ê17k) - A cd command that learns - easily navigate directories from the command line.
